avalancheActivity.comment: In particular in the regions exposed to heavier precipitation and on steep slopes medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large loose snow avalanches are possible as a consequence of the new snow. The new snow and wind slabs of Wednesday can be released easily in all aspects above the tree line. Individual gliding avalanches can also occur. As a consequence of the rain, the likelihood of gliding avalanches and snow slides being released will increase on very steep slopes below approximately 1400 m.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The new snow and wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: Over a wide area new snow is lying on the soft surface of an old snowpack. The fresh wind slabs are lying on soft layers in particular on northwest to north to northeast facing aspects above approximately 2500 m. The fresh wind slabs are to be assessed with care and prudence. In particular slopes adjacent to ridgelines are especially precarious.

tendency.comment: Over a wide area wind and new snow. Over a wide area 30 to 40 cm of snow, and even more in some localities, will fall above approximately 1500 m. Gradual increase in avalanche danger as a consequence of new snow and wind.

avalancheActivity.comment: The new snow and wind slabs of Wednesday can be released by a single winter sport participant in isolated cases in all aspects above the tree line. Individual gliding avalanches can also occur. The wind slabs are easy to recognise and can be released by large loads in particular. The wind slabs of the last few days are to be evaluated with care and prudence in particular on northwest to north to northeast facing aspects above the tree line. These are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The new snow and wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: Over a wide area new snow is lying on the soft surface of an old snowpack. The fresh wind slabs are to be assessed with care and prudence. In particular slopes adjacent to ridgelines are especially precarious.
